_description: This configuration uses an existing S3 bucket but still deploys assets to it. Useful when bucket is managed separately or shared across environments.
name: {{ENVIRONMENT}}-{{WORKLOAD_NAME}}-hybrid-site

bucket._comment: Use existing bucket instead of creating new one
bucket.name: shared-assets-bucket
bucket._note: Bucket must already exist and be accessible

assets._note: Assets will be deployed to bucket root, not versioned subdirectory

cloudfront._note: Invalidation still useful even without versioning to clear cache
